casebody.data:
No. 10-7397. Vester Kay Scurlock-Ferguson, Petitioner v. City of Durham, North Carolina. 562 U.S. 1273, 131 S. Ct. 1601,

179 L. Ed. 2d 504,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1918, March 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 381 Fed. Appx. 302.
